40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Dharr:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Jibril came to me and gave me glad tidings, that whoever dies without associating anything with Allah, then he will enter Paradise. I said: "Even if he commits adultery and theft?" He said: "Yes

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي افْتِرَاقِ هَذِهِ الأُمَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Splitting That Will Occur In This Ummah
